description: Lender deceased 1939. City scene of Rue de La Paix. Nearing sunset.  There are lots of horses and carriages, as well as street goers. City street lamps are just starting to light up.
dimension:
41 1/4 x 35 in. (104.78 x 88.9 cm) (outer frame)
39 3/16 x 31 5/8 in. (99.54 x 80.33 cm) (inner frame)
title: Rue de la Paix
